analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā paritta ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa.
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na akusalam dhammam paccayā paritta ārammaṇaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cuddasa pe avigate cuddasa

original: Naparittārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo parittārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ paritta ārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) … Ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare
analyzed: paccayo saṅkhitta ārammaṇe ekavīsa adhipatiyā nava anantare samanantare

original: ekavīsa, upanissaye ekavīsa, natthiyā vigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: ekavīsa upanissaye ekavīsa natthiyāḥ vigate ekavīsa
